Commands.Shining Shield: Shields the target and grants them Small Max BRV Up for 5 turns.  Shield buff protects the target from BRV damage for 2.3 times WoL's Initial BRV.
Commands.Throw Buckler: 1-HIT BRV attack with low Action Delay.  Shields WoL for 2.3 times his Initial BRV and grants Small Attack Up for 5 turns.  Provokes the target for 5 turns.
Commands.Resist Up All: Grants Party BRV Damage Reduction for 3 turns.  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Shining Wave: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  BRV potency is based on the Shield durability values of all party members.  Greatly recovers all party members' HP based on HP damage dealt up to 10% of their Max HP.  Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds the target's Max HP, the excess is converted to BRV.  Grants Medium Speed Up for 5 turns.

Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Shining Shield + Throw Buckler Up: Slightly raises the potency of buffs granted by Shining Shield and Throw Buckler.
Passives.HP Damage BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after taking HP damage.
Passives.Support Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense of shielded allies.
Passives.Throw Buckler Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Throw Buckler.
Passives.BRV Live: Prevents Break status if BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Shining Shield Charge: Increases the max uses of Shining Shield by 1.
Passives.Throw Buckler Charge: Increases the max uses of Throw Buckler by 1.
Passives.Class Change: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Buff Boost&Guard Up: Greatly raises Max BRV and Defense while buffed.
Passives.Shining Shield Extend: Increases Shining Shield's max uses by 2.When using Shining Shield:- Raises party's BRV by 50% of Initial BRV before the BRV multiplier is applied.- Moderately raises the BRV multiplier and applies it to the party's BRV.- Grants Shield to all party members.- Turns the Max BRV Up buff to Light's Will, which adds Small Attack Up + BRV regen effects and grants it to all party members.- Triggers an HP attack after use.While Light's Will is active:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.- BRV Attack+ is a 2-HIT melee BRV attack with a moderate potency boost.- Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+.HP Attack+ raises BRV based on Initial BRV before inflicting an HP attack.While Light's Will is active and all party members are shielded:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack++.- BRV Attack++ is a 2-HIT melee BRV attack with a moderate potency boost.- Turns HP Attack to HP Attack++.- HP Attack++ is a 1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack with 120% overflow.Light's Will grants a BRV regen effect to all party members and raises party's Max BRV and Attack.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Slightly raises the potency of buffs granted by Shining Shield and Throw Buckler.
Passives.Throw Buckler Extend: When using Throw Buckler:- Raises party's BRV based on Initial BRV.- Increases the number of hits to 4.- Tremendously raises its total potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.- Grants Light's Will for 5 turns.- Triggers an HP attack after use.
Passives.Resonance of Bravery and Defense: Raises party's Initial BRV by 10% and Defense by 20%.
Passives.Resist Up All Extend: When using Resist Up All, adds the following effect:- Grants BRV Regen to all party members.
